subject: Base plate compatible with Pro Plus
description_text:
Hello. 

I recently ordered your Pro Plus pedals on your Amazon store and I need to order a base plate. Currently they are not available on Amazon. I saw I can order it directly from your site. Does the base plate that is compatible with the Pro Plus pedals come with a heel riser?  If not are they available for this plate?  Please let me know and how to go about ordering both. 

Thank you. 

Tim Heise
239-682-7492

conversations.body_text: Hi TIMOTHY HEISE,      You can click this link to purchase. We do not offer the heel riser plate for separate purchase.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pedal-pro-plus-with-baseplate?variant=50475291509050
